i am sorry for stupid questions i have used many game torrents but only for my pc  never for my ps2    so i have some questions i hope some of you can answer for me 
1 do u need a mod chip or anything to play the game?
2 how do i burn it on a disk so ps2 can read it? (please be specific on this one ^_^)
thanks for helping guys
Yes you need a chip. Burn it with Dvd decrypt. That work´s for me.

Yes, mod chip is a neccesity, then you will also be able to play both pal and ntsc versions.

the mod chip is worth every cent.  But, don't try to install it yourself. it is fucking confusing and hard to do and you can screw up the entire console.  spend the little extra dough and have someone do it who knows what they are doing.

oy, the second part of your question. Unpack it and extract it to a file so you have an iso image. use winrar to do this.

Once you have the image, use "burn image" in nero, change the file reader in nero to "read all files" then simply burn the image onto a dvd.  But, you can make no use of the disks unless you get the mod chip.

/fido

Omegafrog: You do not actually have to modchip your ps2. There is an exploit available that can be installed on your memorycard only. Google for cogswap. This way you will not have to actually fiddle with the ps2 itself.
